resources.string: You face an angry spectre and hear spooky howling all around you. The ghosts know you\'re here! Game over.
Congratulations, you\'ve trapped all the ghosts - you win!

Ghost Sweeper is a simple Android app written in Java, created as my second individual project during CodeClan\'s 16-week software development course. See the game\'s Github repository or learn more about my other projects from my personal website.
Game mechanics based on the popular Minesweeper game. Icons made by Roundicons, Freepik and Dimitry Miroliubov from www.flaticon.com. Licensed under CC 3.0 BY.
